The Easiest Book Club Ever

We read a chapter or two each week and fangirl out in the
comments section of my weekly recap & review hosted online.

Purchase on Amazon   Read the Recaps

How Exactly does this work?

  1. Each week I'll post what chapter(s) will be covered in the recap & discussion for next week.
  2. I write and email to the subscribers a bite-sized, perfect for your subway ride, recap covering what we just read.
  3. The recap is then hosted online with extra commentary, assorted musings, and predictions.
  4. We chat back and forth in the comments section with all our spoilery goodness, and fangirl-y theories!
